entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning early this evening. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 5:08 PM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:08 PM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 5:08 PM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023
